A

actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class gui.AddVoice
Button's ActionListener of the dialog window
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class gui.ComboBoxListener
Sets or remove a filter in the table based on the user's choice
If the choice is "Seleziona periodo" a DateDialog appears to le the users set an arbitrary filter
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class gui.DateDialog
Action thrown by the buttons of the dialog, the DateRowFilter is applied using the spinners' values
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class gui.MainWindow
Listener linked to the JButtons to add and remove a balance voice
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class gui.MenuActionListener
ActionListener to perform the actions provided by the menu of the MainWindow
The actions are: Saving the balance Searching for occurrences in the table Print Export the table in these formats: CSV Text Excel ODS
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class gui.SearchDialog
 
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class gui.WelcomeScreen
Listener of the button panel
add(E) - Method in class bilancio.Archive
Appends the element object.
AddVoice - Class in gui
Dialog window to add a new voice to the balance
The dialog contains two spinners - one for the date and one for the amount - and a text field to insert the description
AddVoice(Frame, String) - Constructor for class gui.AddVoice
Builds a non modal dialog window, with specified owner and title
The owner can't be null
approveSelection() - Method in class gui.FileChooser
When the user chooses to save the file if the dialog is in Save mode and the file already exists, the user must confirm to overwrite the file
Archive<E> - Class in bilancio
Provides an archive for the management of elements of the same type
Archive(int) - Constructor for class bilancio.Archive
Instantiates an archive of the specified length
Archive() - Constructor for class bilancio.Archive
Instantiates an archive of length 10
